text: Choi Yu-hwa (born October 10, 1985) is a South Korean actress. Choi entered the entertainment industry after winning the Fashion Model Award at the fashion magazine CeCi's Model Contest in 2005. She debuted in the one-act Drama Special "The Great Gye Choon-bin" (2010), and in the television series My Princess (2011), she gained attention for her looks and acting ability. == Filmography == === Film === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
